p1: A Braccetto, nestled between the Pantheon and the Luxembourg Gardens, invites you to an experience marked by elegance. In a refined setting, the authentic flavors of Italy blossom through dishes carefully prepared using fresh ingredients.
p2: Our culinary adventure is the fruit of a harmonious collaboration between a dedicated and passionate Franco-Italian team, always eager to go further to satisfy our customers.
p3: Whether for a romantic dinner, a business lunch or a family gathering, our restaurant offers a friendly and sophisticated environment, where la dolce vita meets the French art of living. We invite you to discover our passion for cuisine, our attentive service and our warm atmosphere.

Acces.Velib: Velib - Le Goff - Gay-Lussac (~50m) - Cujas - Saint-Michel (~50m)
